name: Bleak Winter
description:
In Bleak Winter, the world and everything in it is against you, and your only goal is survival at any cost.

Bleak Winter is a brutal third-person survival game in which you must do whatever you can to survive versus the harsh wildlands and everything within it. There are finite resources, and infinite threats to your survival.

Building


Using harvested and scavenged resources found within the world, build and decorate bases to defend yourself from threats within the world.

Crafting


Craft items using harvested and scavenged resources to get an advantage on the world. Craft weaponry, fishing equipment, health items, clothing and other sundries to aid your survival.

Survival


Sometimes you just need to do whatever it takes to survive. You can cook food, harvest water, work with friends to build large settlements and explore. There are no rules in the wildlands, just one shared goal - surviving. It's survive or perish.

Bleak Winter is an Early Access title, please note that if you are looking for a complete, balanced and bug-free title, then we urge you to revisit the title upon full release.

(*) At Early Access launch, Bleak Winter is a solo-mode survival experience, however multiplayer support is planned and in development.
